statements: SELECT * FROM user_feedback;
SELECT user_id, feedback_text FROM user_feedback WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT feedback_text, rating FROM user_feedback WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, feedback_text, rating FROM user_feedback ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT user_id, feedback_text FROM user_feedback WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT user_id, feedback_text, rating, timestamp FROM user_feedback WHERE rating > 3 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT user_id, feedback_text, rating FROM user_feedback WHERE feedback_text LIKE '%great%' ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_feedback WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' AND feedback_text LIKE '%improve%' ORDER BY rating ASC;
SELECT user_id, feedback_text, rating FROM user_feedback WHERE rating < 3 AND feedback_text IS NOT NULL ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT user_id, feedback_text, rating, timestamp FROM user_feedback WHERE rating BETWEEN 2 AND 4 ORDER BY rating DESC, timestamp ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM UserFeedback;
SELECT user_id, rating FROM UserFeedback WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT experience_id, experience_name FROM ARExperiences WHERE experience_rating >= 4.5;
SELECT * FROM UserFeedback JOIN ARExperiences ON UserFeedback.experience_id = ARExperiences.experience_id;
SELECT user_id, rating, experience_name FROM UserFeedback JOIN ARExperiences ON UserFeedback.experience_id = ARExperiences.experience_id WHERE rating > 3 AND experience_rating >= 4.5;
SELECT * FROM UserFeedback JOIN ARExperiences ON UserFeedback.experience_id = ARExperiences.experience_id WHERE UserFeedback.rating > 3;
SELECT user_id, rating, experience_name FROM UserFeedback JOIN ARExperiences ON UserFeedback.experience_id = ARExperiences.experience_id WHERE experience_rating > 4;
SELECT user_id, feedback_text FROM UserFeedback WHERE rating < 2 ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT experience_description FROM ARExperiences WHERE experience_id = 1;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_feedback FROM UserFeedback;
SELECT * FROM user_feedback WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT feedback_text, rating FROM user_feedback ORDER BY feedback_id DESC;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE registration_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT experience_name, category FROM educational_experiences WHERE duration_minutes > 60 ORDER BY experience_id ASC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(feedback_id) AS total_feedback FROM user_feedback GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT * FROM user_feedback WHERE rating > 3 ORDER BY feedback_id DESC;

SELECT feedback_text, rating FROM user_feedback INNER JOIN educational_experiences ON user_feedback.experience_id = educational_experiences.experience_id WHERE category = 'Science' ORDER BY user_feedback.feedback_id ASC;

SELECT users.username, user_feedback.feedback_text, educational_experiences.experience_name FROM user_feedback INNER JOIN users ON user_feedback.user_id = users.user_id INNER JOIN educational_experiences ON user_feedback.experience_id = educational_experiences.experience_id WHERE users.username = 'john_doe' AND user_feedback.rating BETWEEN 2 AND 4;
SELECT DISTINCT category FROM educational_experiences ORDER BY category ASC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS feedback_count FROM user_feedback GROUP BY user_id HAVING feedback_count > 1 ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM user_feedback;
SELECT user_id, feedback_text, rating FROM user_feedback WHERE rating > 3 ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT experience_name, topic, duration_in_minutes FROM educational_experiences WHERE duration_in_minutes > 60;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE role = 'admin';
SELECT user_id, experience_id, response_text FROM feedback_responses WHERE user_id = 123 AND experience_id = 456;
SELECT * FROM user_feedback WHERE rating > 3 ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT feedback_text, rating FROM user_feedback WHERE experience_id = 5 ORDER BY rating ASC;
SELECT u.username, u.email, ef.rating FROM users u JOIN user_feedback ef ON u.user_id = ef.user_id WHERE ef.rating <= 2;
SELECT ef.feedback_text, ef.rating, e.experience_name FROM user_feedback ef JOIN educational_experiences e ON ef.experience_id = e.experience_id;
SELECT u.username, u.email, fr.response_text FROM users u JOIN feedback_responses fr ON u.user_id = fr.user_id WHERE fr.response_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM user_feedback WHERE rating > 4;
SELECT user_id, feedback_text FROM user_feedback WHERE user_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM educational_experiences WHERE category = 'Science' ORDER BY title DESC;
SELECT id, username, email FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'A%';
SELECT f.id, f.feedback_text, c.category_name FROM user_feedback f JOIN feedback_categories c ON f.category_id = c.id;
SELECT * FROM user_feedback ORDER BY rating DESC, id ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT u.username, COUNT(uf.id) AS total_feedback FROM users u JOIN user_feedback uf ON u.id = uf.user_id GROUP BY u.username ORDER BY total_feedback DESC;
SELECT e.title, f.category_name FROM educational_experiences e JOIN feedback_categories f ON e.category = f.id WHERE e.id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY e.title ASC;
SELECT u.username, COUNT(f.rating) AS total_ratings FROM users u JOIN feedback_ratings f ON u.id = f.user_id GROUP BY u.username ORDER BY total_ratings DESC;
SELECT uf.feedback_text, u.username FROM user_feedback uf JOIN users u ON uf.user_id = u.id WHERE uf.rating >= 4 ORDER BY u.username, uf.id DESC LIMIT 10;
